div.p: Codes used to identify health care device metric types and units and component types as part of the ISO/IEEE 11073-10101 Medical Device Communication Nomenclature.

Copyright Statement: This value set is available IEEE (https://standards.ieee.org/findstds/standard/11073-10101a-2015.html) as well as at https://rtmms.nist.gov/rtmms/index.htm#!hrosetta through NIST's Rosetta Terminology Mapping Management System which has a Royalty Free Agreement with IEEE to make the terminology [specifically five attributes: Reference ID, Terminology Code, Description, Systematic Name, and Common Term] available for development of IEEE 11073 compliant products.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in urn:iso:std:iso:11073:10101

description.value: Codes used to identify health care device metric types and units and component types as part of the ISO/IEEE 11073-10101 Medical Device Communication Nomenclature.
